---
title: NOI 2025
date: 2025-02-22
image: /assets/IMG_8130.jpeg
description: Multiple Finalists. 1 student achieved NOI Gold.
layout: article.njk
---
In 2025, multiple J1s and J2s attended the NOI competition, 5 of which achieved NOI finals, and one of which managed to get NOI Gold, allowing direct entrance into NUS Computing.
